name: The Story of the Hero's Adventure
name_original: The Story of the Hero's Adventure
description:
This is the new game I made from Game Gen called The Story of the Hero's Adventure you can do anything you want on this game it's your own adventure.

The controls are Left arrow = Move Left, Up arrow = Move Up, Right arrow = Move Right, Down arrow = Move Down.

I = Open Inventory, Z = Slash/Pick Item, X = Use Item when equipped.

That's all about it on the game hope you all enjoy this game that I worked on and good luck.
